trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON030GETTREASUREMAP_00172_AURIANA_000_000<tab>Looking to get your hands on some alexandrite, are you? I have a map right here which should lead you to a buried cache. For 75 <var 31 ((Item)) 04 (( 28)) 0302 /var>, it's yours.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON030GETTREASUREMAP_00172_AURIANA_000_005<tab>Here─sealed for your peace of mind. You may decipher it at your leisure.

TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON030GETTREASUREMAP_00172_AURIANA_000_010<tab>You've a mind to acquire some alexandrite, do you? I've none in my possession, but I do have a map or two which might lead you to a cache─provided you can decipher them.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON030GETTREASUREMAP_00172_AURIANA_000_011<tab>...Judging from the way you cocked your head just now, you haven't the foggiest what I'm talking about. Come back when you do.

TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON030GETTREASUREMAP_00172_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>You cannot purchase mysterious maps until you have learned the general action <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Decipher<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON030GETTREASUREMAP_00172_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>To do so, you must first complete the quest “Treasures and Tribulations.”

TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON030GETTREASUREMAP_00172_AURIANA_000_030<tab>Much as I'd love to help you indulge your impulses, I cannot sell you another mysterious map until you decipher the one in your possession.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON030GETTREASUREMAP_00172_AURIANA_000_050<tab>The price is not negotiable─75 <var 31 ((Item)) 04 (( 28)) 0302 /var>, and not one less.
